definition: abbr. for 眾議院|众议院[Zhong4 yi4 yuan4], House of Representatives
to do with the masses/mass (meeting, movement etc)
peanut gallery (esp. in online forums)/onlookers who are interested in the spectacle but don't have anything knowledgeable to say about it/(neologism c. 2016)
crowdsourcing/abbr. to 眾包|众包[zhong4 bao1]
the mass line, CCP term for Party policy aimed at broadening and cultivating contacts with the masses

sentences.english: There are shelled the Preah Vihear Temple in the military demands of the masses.
sentences.chinese: 还有群众要求军方炮轰柏威夏寺。

sentences.english: The popular PE is the major part of the whole career of PE.
sentences.chinese: 群众体育是构成整个体育事业的重要组成部分。

sentences.english: Figueres thanked the crowd for their enthusiasm.
sentences.chinese: 费格雷斯对群众的热情表示感激。

sentences.english: Mobilize the whole society to participate in a wide range of development, needs for mobilizing the masses.
sentences.chinese: 发动全社会广泛的参与发展，需要进行群众动员。

sentences.english: His speech kindled the crowd with passion.
sentences.chinese: 他的演讲使群众充满激情。

sentences.english: Keeping close contact with the masses is a good tradition of our Party.
sentences.chinese: 密切联系群众是我们党的优良传统。

sentences.english: News consensus supervision is an important form of mass supervision.
sentences.chinese: 新闻舆论监督是一种群众监督的重要形式。

sentences.english: Assistant directors often have to direct the extras in the background.
sentences.chinese: 助理导演总是得指挥背景里的群众演员。

sentences.english: Now a mass movement to plant trees is in full swing all over the country.
sentences.chinese: 群众性的技术革新运动正在该厂蓬勃开展。

sentences.english: Protesters also seized the country's state-owned television station.
sentences.chinese: 抗议群众还占据了吉尔吉斯斯坦国营电视台。

sentences.english: Football has a good public basis and tradition in the prefectures of kashgar and kerkyz, Xinjiang.
sentences.chinese: 足球运动在新疆中小学校具有良好的群众基础和传统。

sentences.english: There are plenty of extras, including a cigarette-lighter adapter.
sentences.chinese: 有很多群众演员，包括香烟打火机适配器。

sentences.english: This is a literary and artistic work loved by the masses.
sentences.chinese: 这是一部为群众所喜闻乐见的文艺作品。

sentences.english: Our leaders joined the people in the festivities in the parks.
sentences.chinese: 我们的领导人参加了群众的游园庆祝活动。

definition: cadres and masses/party officials and ordinary people
complaint letter/petition letter/see also 上訪|上访[shang4 fang3]
for the convenience and benefit of the people (idiom)
to dispatch police to the scene of crime, accident etc
civil police/PRC police/abbr. for 人民警察
